price: 12 Or, seul renie son avènement tout impie et pécheur invétéré,
arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā yukadhibu bihi illā kullu muʿ'tadin athīmin
